implements IMessage

    • Field Detail

      • edited_timestamp

        public String edited_timestamp
        The time at which the message has been edited. is null if the message has not been edited

      • nonce

        public String nonce
        Used for checking if the message has been sent

      • webhookID

        public String webhookID
        The id of the webhook that sent the message. null if sent by a bot/user account

      • mentions

        public Mentions mentions
        An object containing the information about who was mentioned in the message

        The current instance of DiscLoader

        public final T extends ITextChannel channel
        The channel the message was sent in

      • author

        public final IUser author

      • guild

        public IGuild guild
        The guild the channel is in. is null if Channel.type is "dm" or "groupDM"

      • member

        public IGuildMember member

      • canDelete

        public boolean canDelete()
        Description copied from interface: IMessage
        Checks if the user you are logged in as is able to delete the message. Should return true if either: you are the messsage's author, or you have the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.
        Specified by:
        canDelete in interface IMessage
        Returns:
        true if you can delete the message, false otherwise.

        Description copied from interface: IMessage

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if you are able to edit the message , otherwise false.

        Ex: "user has pinned a message to this channel." would be a system message
